channel.title: Bagus Dwi Permana - Operations Engineering Journal
channel.description: Technical articles on data center operations, infrastructure reliability, and engineering leadership.

item.title: The $37 Billion Opportunity: Why SEA's Data Center Surge Will Define the Next Digital Decade
item.description: A structural demand analysis: $602B hyperscaler capex, Jevons Paradox, $1T digital economy, sovereign AI mandates across 6 nations. Why SEA's data center expansion is the infrastructure opportunity of a generation.
item.dc:creator: Bagus Dwi Permana

item.title: The Great SEA Data Center Bubble: When $37 Billion Bets on a Promise
item.description: 6,068 MW pipeline. $37B invested. Johor's 5.8 GW gamble. Indonesia's DCII at 119 MW. Is Southeast Asia building a data center bubble? Deep analysis with interactive calculator.
item.dc:creator: Bagus Dwi Permana

item.title: Data Center Service Catalog: 120+ Services Ranked by Revenue
item.description: The definitive guide to DC services â€” 120 items across 12 categories with regional pricing for Americas, Europe, SEA, and Australia. Interactive revenue calculator included.
item.dc:creator: Bagus Dwi Permana

item.title: The $64 Billion Rebellion: Communities vs Data Centers
item.description: $64B blocked across 24 states. 142 activist groups. Malaysia's first DC protest. Interactive calculator to assess your community's impact.
item.dc:creator: Bagus Dwi Permana

item.title: Data Center Power Distribution Design: Hyperscaler Architecture Deep Dive
item.description: Ultra-comprehensive technical analysis of AWS, Google, Microsoft, xAI power distribution systems with failure scenarios and reliability engineering.
item.dc:creator: Bagus Dwi Permana

item.title: The Uncomfortable Truth: How AI Data Centers Are Secretly Funding Your Grid's Future
item.description: Contrarian analysis: $57B+ renewable investment, grid modernization, and economic value creation from data centers.
item.dc:creator: Bagus Dwi Permana

item.title: AI Data Centers vs Citizen Electricity Bills: Who Really Pays?
item.description: Comprehensive analysis of AI data center electricity consumption impact on citizen bills in Southeast Asia. Interactive calculator, IEA projects 945 TWh by 2030.
item.dc:creator: Bagus Dwi Permana

item.title: Water Stress and AI Data Centers: The Hidden Crisis in Southeast Asia
item.description: 58% of global data centers operate in water-stressed regions. Interactive water stress analysis for Southeast Asia.
item.dc:creator: Bagus Dwi Permana

item.title: The 72-Hour Warning: Global Emergency Preparedness Guide 2026
item.description: Why 20+ nations urge 72-hour preparedness. NEW START expired, NATO concerns, infrastructure attacks. Interactive survival kit calculator included.
item.dc:creator: Bagus Dwi Permana

item.title: The HVAC Shock: No Chillers Doesn't Mean No Cooling
item.description: Deep technical analysis of chiller-free cooling for data centers with tropical climate implementation guide.
item.dc:creator: Bagus Dwi Permana

item.title: Building the RCA Reflex: Root Cause Analysis as Team Culture
item.description: Transform root cause analysis from bureaucratic exercise into instinctive team response.
item.dc:creator: Bagus Dwi Permana

item.title: Engineers Won't Read Your SOPs
item.description: Why traditional SOPs fail and how to build knowledge sharing systems that engineers actually use.
item.dc:creator: Bagus Dwi Permana

item.title: The Team That Stayed: 91% Retention in a 36% Industry
item.description: How we achieved 91% team retention in an industry averaging 36%.
item.dc:creator: Bagus Dwi Permana

item.title: Maintenance Compliance: The Art of Accountability
item.description: Achieving 99.9% work order compliance through systematic accountability.
item.dc:creator: Bagus Dwi Permana

item.title: Alarm Fatigue: The Silent Killer
item.description: How I reduced 97% of noise alarms. Understanding alarm fatigue and building effective alerting systems.
item.dc:creator: Bagus Dwi Permana

item.title: My First Technical Debt
item.description: Honest reflection on early career infrastructure mistakes and the lessons they taught.
item.dc:creator: Bagus Dwi Permana

item.title: From 4 to 10: How to Actually Improve NPS
item.description: Client satisfaction engineering for critical infrastructure.
item.dc:creator: Bagus Dwi Permana

item.title: When Nothing Happens, Engineering Is Working
item.description: The silent victory of operations engineering.
item.dc:creator: Bagus Dwi Permana
